statements: SELECT * FROM forestry_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT tree_species, location, area_covered FROM forestry_data WHERE deforestation_rate > 3.5;
SELECT id, tree_species, deforestation_rate FROM forestry_data WHERE area_covered < 1000;
SELECT * FROM forestry_data WHERE location LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, tree_species, deforestation_rate FROM forestry_data WHERE ecosystem_preservation = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM forestry_data WHERE area_covered > 1000 ORDER BY tree_species ASC;
SELECT id, tree_species, location FROM forestry_data WHERE deforestation_rate < 3.5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT tree_species, SUM(area_covered) AS total_area_covered FROM forestry_data GROUP BY tree_species HAVING total_area_covered > 5000;
SELECT * FROM forestry_data WHERE reforestation_efforts LIKE '%planting%' AND ecosystem_preservation = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(deforestation_rate) AS average_deforestation_rate FROM forestry_data WHERE ecosystem_preservation = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data WHERE location = 'Amazon' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, location FROM reforestation_data WHERE reforestation_efforts = 'Planting trees' ORDER BY location;
SELECT location, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM reforestation_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(deforestation_rate) AS avg_deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data WHERE location = 'Amazon' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(deforestation_rate) AS avg_deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(deforestation_rate) > 0.5;
SELECT d.location, d.date, r.reforestation_efforts FROM deforestation_data d JOIN reforestation_data r ON d.location = r.location WHERE d.deforestation_rate > 0.8;
SELECT MAX(deforestation_rate) AS max_deforestation_rate, MIN(deforestation_rate) AS min_deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data;
SELECT * FROM reforestation_data WHERE reforestation_efforts LIKE '%planting%' AND location != 'Tropical Forest';
SELECT * FROM forest_data;
SELECT region, deforestation_rate FROM forest_data;
SELECT * FROM tree_species ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT species_name, average_height FROM tree_species WHERE growth_rate > 0.5;
SELECT ecosystem_name, biodiversity_index FROM ecosystem_health ORDER BY ecosystem_id;
SELECT * FROM forest_data WHERE region = 'Amazonia';
SELECT region, deforestation_rate FROM forest_data WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY deforestation_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM tree_species WHERE growth_rate > 0.2 AND average_height < 50;
SELECT species_name, growth_rate FROM tree_species WHERE average_height > 60 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
SELECT ecosystem_name, biodiversity_index, conservation_status FROM ecosystem_health WHERE biodiversity_index < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationData;
SELECT id, location, date_recorded FROM DeforestationData ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT id, location, deforestation_rate FROM DeforestationData WHERE deforestation_rate > 5;
SELECT location, deforestation_rate FROM DeforestationData WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM DeforestationData UNION SELECT * FROM ReforestationEfforts;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationData ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, deforestation_rate FROM DeforestationData WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.5;
SELECT AVG(deforestation_rate) as avg_deforestation_rate, MAX(deforestation_rate) as max_deforestation_rate FROM DeforestationData GROUP BY location;
SELECT R.location, R.success_rate, D.deforestation_rate FROM ReforestationEfforts R JOIN DeforestationData D ON R.location = D.location;

SELECT NE.ecosystem_type, NE.biodiversity_rating, LA.impact_on_ecosystem FROM NaturalEcosystems NE JOIN LoggingActivities LA ON NE.id = LA.id WHERE NE.biodiversity_rating > 0.7 AND LA.logs_harvested > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Forests;
SELECT forest_name, location FROM Forests ORDER BY forest_name ASC;
SELECT deforestation_date, deforestation_cause FROM DeforestationData WHERE deforestation_cause = 'Illegal logging';
SELECT reforestation_id, reforestation_date, reforestation_method FROM ReforestationEfforts ORDER BY reforestation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoggingActivities WHERE logging_type IN ('Selective logging', 'Clear-cutting');
SELECT * FROM Forests;
SELECT forest_name, location FROM Forests WHERE forest_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationData ORDER BY deforestation_date DESC;
SELECT forest_name, reforestation_date FROM ReforestationEfforts WHERE reforestation_method = 'Planting' ORDER BY reforestation_date ASC;

SELECT d.deforestation_date, r.reforestation_date, l.logging_date FROM DeforestationData d JOIN ReforestationEfforts r ON d.forest_id = r.forest_id JOIN LoggingActivities l ON d.forest_id = l.forest_id WHERE d.forest_id = 1;
